name: Save new Invoiced invoices to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new invoice is created in Invoiced, Make will automatically add it to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_vTvIrK8oOKxvapqd_oIm-LYimd9_I6EQmbJo0sO-8A/edit?usp=sharing).
